- [Railway.app](https://docs.embedchain.ai/deployment/railway.md): Deploy your RAG application to railway.app
- [Render.com](https://docs.embedchain.ai/deployment/render_com.md): Deploy your RAG application to render.com platform
- [Streamlit.io](https://docs.embedchain.ai/deployment/streamlit_io.md): Deploy your RAG application to streamlit.io platform

- [Open-Source AI Assistant](https://docs.embedchain.ai/examples/opensource-assistant.md)
- [🔮 Poe Bot](https://docs.embedchain.ai/examples/poe_bot.md)
- [Add data](https://docs.embedchain.ai/examples/rest-api/add-data.md): Add a data source to an app.
- [Check status](https://docs.embedchain.ai/examples/rest-api/check-status.md): Endpoint to check the status of the API
- [Create app](https://docs.embedchain.ai/examples/rest-api/create.md): Create a new app using App ID
- [Delete app](https://docs.embedchain.ai/examples/rest-api/delete.md): Delete an existing app
- [Deploy app](https://docs.embedchain.ai/examples/rest-api/deploy.md): Deploy an existing app.
- [Get all apps](https://docs.embedchain.ai/examples/rest-api/get-all-apps.md): Get all applications
- [Get data](https://docs.embedchain.ai/examples/rest-api/get-data.md): Get all data sources for an app
- [🌍 Getting Started](https://docs.embedchain.ai/examples/rest-api/getting-started.md)
- [Query app](https://docs.embedchain.ai/examples/rest-api/query.md): Query an app
- [🎪 Community showcase](https://docs.embedchain.ai/examples/showcase.md)
- [null](https://docs.embedchain.ai/examples/slack-AI.md)
- [💼 Slack Bot](https://docs.embedchain.ai/examples/slack_bot.md)
- [📱 Telegram Bot](https://docs.embedchain.ai/examples/telegram_bot.md)
- [💬 WhatsApp Bot](https://docs.embedchain.ai/examples/whatsapp_bot.md)
- [Overview](https://docs.embedchain.ai/get-started/deployment.md): Deploy your RAG application to production
- [❓ FAQs](https://docs.embedchain.ai/get-started/faq.md): Collections of all the frequently asked questions
- [💻 Full stack](https://docs.embedchain.ai/get-started/full-stack.md)
- [📚 Introduction](https://docs.embedchain.ai/get-started/introduction.md)
- [⚡ Quickstart](https://docs.embedchain.ai/get-started/quickstart.md): 💡 Create an AI app on your own data in a minute
- [⛓️ Chainlit](https://docs.embedchain.ai/integration/chainlit.md): Integrate with Chainlit to create LLM chat apps
- [🧊 Helicone](https://docs.embedchain.ai/integration/helicone.md): Implement Helicone, the open-source LLM observability platform, with Embedchain. Monitor, debug, and optimize your AI applications effortlessly.
- [🛠️ LangSmith](https://docs.embedchain.ai/integration/langsmith.md): Integrate with Langsmith to debug and monitor your LLM app
- [🔭 OpenLIT](https://docs.embedchain.ai/integration/openlit.md): OpenTelemetry-native Observability and Evals for LLMs & GPUs
- [🚀 Streamlit](https://docs.embedchain.ai/integration/streamlit-mistral.md): Integrate with Streamlit to plug and play with any LLM
- [ 📜 Release Notes](https://docs.embedchain.ai/product/release-notes.md)
- [🤖 Chatbots](https://docs.embedchain.ai/use-cases/chatbots.md)
